channel.title: Weird problem

item.title: Weird problem
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

I have an interface I am trying to load, but it has problems. When I use this code the interface flashes:

if(inZamorak() || inSaradomin()){ setInterfaceWalkable(6673); sendFrame126("@whi@Next Game Begins In: "+ (PlayerHandler.cwTimer / 2 / 60) +" @whi@Minutes", 6570); sendFrame126("", 6572); sendFrame126("", 6664); }

When I use this code the interface stops flashing, but I am unable to move:

if(inZamorak() || inSaradomin()){ clearQuestInterface(); CAM().sendQuest("@whi@Next Game Begins In: "+ (PlayerHandler.cwTimer / 2 / 60) +" @whi@Minutes", 6570); CAM().sendFrame126("", 6572); CAM().sendFrame126("", 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); CAM().showInterface(6673); flushOutStream(); }

How do I make it so the interface doesn’t flash, and I am able to walk around?

I have this under “public boolean process() {”

Read full topic
